column1: On 27th January 2009, the 1st Pe(cid:415)(cid:415)oner had visited the Negombo Police Sta(cid:415)on to obtain
a copy of a complaint that had been made by the wife of Nishantha Fernando over the
loss of her iden(cid:415)ty card. There had been an exchange of words between the 1st Pe(cid:415)(cid:415)oner
and the Oﬃcer of the Civil Defence Force who was on duty at the entrance to the Police
Sta(cid:415)on  with  regard  to  the  place  where  the  Pe(cid:415)(cid:415)oner  could  park  his  vehicle.    The  1st
Pe(cid:415)(cid:415)oner  states  that  he  therea(cid:332)er  met  the  12th  Respondent,  who  was  the  Oﬃcer-in-
Charge of Administra(cid:415)on who had directed another oﬃcer to provide the 1st Pe(cid:415)(cid:415)oner
with a copy of such complaint. Thus, at this point of (cid:415)me, there is no complaint by the 1st
